data.title: Covers and Derivative Works Basics
data.meta_description: Explore the world of covers & derivative works. Learn how to pay tribute to your favorite creators & grow your fanbase while respecting copyright laws.
data.text:
Making and can be a way to pay tribute to your favorite , put your own spin on a classic , or grow your fanbase. But any time you want to use another creatorâs work, a host of permissions and considerations are necessary to ensure youâre using the work correctly and not infringing on the rights of any of the or .

There are many ways to use another creatorâs work, but these days, some of the most common are:

Covering an existing musical work by recording your own performance of it

Remixing an existing sound recording

Sampling an existing sound recording

Creating a DJ mix of one or many existing sound recordings

Creating a translation of an existing musical work

Weâve got a lot more information on these in this topic so keep reading.
